briefTitle: The Purpose of This Study is to Demonstrate the Safety and Effectiveness of Calcipotriene Foam in Subjects With Scalp and Body Psoriasis
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Calcipotriene Foam, 0.005%, Versus Vehicle Foam In The Treatment Of Moderate Plaque-Type Scalp And Body Psoriasis
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety and effectiveness in the treatment of psoriasis on the scalp and on the body.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With an Investigator's Static Global Assessment (ISGA) Score of Clear (0) or Almost Clear (1) for Scalp Involvement at Week 8 Using the Failure Method
